Important Announcements
Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate 
7329 Mazyck Road North Charleston, South Carolina 29406 United States
Get Directions Beautiful Charleston Hotel near Tanger Outlets and Downtown Our 93 room all-suite hotel is breath-taking from a distance Hotel Exterior Our well lit hotel is located off I26, close to downtown Relax on our beautiful patio featuring grill stations & a firepit Covered outdoor seating for guests to enjoy Exterior Feature Our hotel is located near shopping, close to Downtown, and more Staybridge Suites Beautiful View at Sunset Hotel Front Exterior Sunset Lobby Lounge Area Bathroom and Shower Second Bedroom Double Queen Guest Room Living and Workspace Two Bedroom Living Space Double Queen Kitchen Fully Stocked ADA Studio ADA Kitchen Fully Stocked Kitchen King Bed Studio Suite Workspace Living Room and Kitchen One Bedroom Suite Double Queen One-Bedroom Suite Front Desk Guest Patio and Grill Area Outside Patio Fully Stocked with Sundries Free guest laundry - no quarters needed. Breakfast and Social Bar Delicious Breakfast Bar Breakfast and Social Dining Complimentary drinks & appetizers on select nights Breakfast and Social Lounge Our multi purpose coffee station is available 24/7 State-of-the-art business center is open 24 hours Heated Indoor Pool Fitness 
: 3:00 PM

Minimum check-in Age Email: GUESTSERVICES@STAYCHARLESTONSC.COM Contact Front Desk: 1-843-3774600 Reservation: Parking & Transportation Details View FAQ Chat with US Suites near Charleston beaches and history 
Charleston, South Carolina is home to historic sites, exciting attractions, beautiful beaches and outstanding restaurants. Designed for extended stay and centrally located near Interstate-26, the offers amenities to help you feel comfortable whether you are visiting for the weekend or planning to stay an entire week, month, or year. North Charleston puts the hotel's guests just minutes from Charleston International Airport (CHS), as well as many local businesses. This North Charleston hotel's property is the perfect home base for those exploring Charleston's many offerings. Historic sites and world-class restaurants in downtown Charleston are minutes away. The Tanger Outlet Center offers great shopping less than five miles from the hotel. The North Charleston Coliseum & Performing Arts Center, which hosts a variety of shows, concerts and sporting events, is also nearby. At this all suite hotel in North Charleston, you'll enjoy apartment-style accommodations and indispensable resources, such as free wired and wireless Internet access throughout the hotel. We're also pleased to provide a complimentary breakfast buffet each morning, as well as our evening social Mon - Wednesday. Begin planning your extended stay in North Charleston today!

Feel at home at Staybridge Suites - this Charleston, SC all suites Hotel.

FAQ for Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate
How much is parking at Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate? 
Complimentary parking is available at Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate for hotel guests.
Can I cancel my booking at Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate for a full refund? 
Always check the hotel's cancellation policy before booking a rate. Room cancellation is subject to rate booked at time of reservation and cancellation policy varies by rate.
Does Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate have a restaurant on site? 
No, there is no on site restaurant at Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate.
Is there free breakfast available at Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate? 
Breakfast is free with your stay at the Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate.
When is breakfast at Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate? 
Breakfast at Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate is available from 6:30 AM to 9:30 AM.
Is there a complimentary shuttle available at Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate? 
No, there is not a complimentary local area shuttle available at Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate.
What are the check-in and check-out times for Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate? 
Check-in at Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate is from 3:00 PM, and check-out time is 12:00 PM. Contact the hotel directly for options available for early check-in or late check-out.
Does Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate have a pool? 
Yes, Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate has an indoor pool.
Is there a fitness center at Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate? 
Yes, there is an onsite fitness center at Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate.
Does Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate offer free Wi-Fi? 
Yes, the Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate offers free WiFi!
Can I bring my pet to Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate? 
Pets are welcome at Staybridge Suites Charleston-Ashley Phosphate. There is a pet deposit per stay of 75 USD . Our Pet Policy: Pets allowed with nonrefundable fee of 75.00 per stay. Pet agreement must be signed on arrival. No aggressive breeds. Record of complete and up to date vaccinations required. No charge for SERVICE ANIMALS.
Read more FAQs
